name: Finance Tools
description: Stock market data including real-time quotes, historical prices, company information, and key financial statistics using Yahoo Finance.

tools.description: Get current stock price and basic quote data
tools.use_when: User asks for current/real-time stock price, quote, or today's price of a ticker
tools.not_for: Historical data (use get_stock_history), company details (use get_company_info), financial metrics (use get_key_statistics)
tools.returns: Dictionary with current price, day high/low, volume, market cap
example_queries: How much is NVDA trading at?

tools.use_when: User asks for historical prices, past performance, price chart data, or OHLCV data
tools.not_for: Current/real-time price (use get_stock_quote), company info (use get_company_info)
tools.returns: Dictionary with ticker, period, and list of historical data points (date, open, high, low, close, volume)
example_queries: Show me Apple's stock history for the past month
TSLA price over the last year

tools.description: Get company information and business summary
tools.use_when: User asks about what a company does, its industry, sector, or business description
tools.not_for: Stock prices (use get_stock_quote), financial metrics (use get_key_statistics)
tools.returns: Dictionary with company name, sector, industry, website, employees, and business summary
example_queries: Tell me about Apple as a company

tools.description: Get key financial statistics and metrics
tools.use_when: User asks for PE ratio, EPS, market cap, beta, dividend yield, 52-week high/low, or other financial metrics
tools.not_for: Current price (use get_stock_quote), company description (use get_company_info)
tools.returns: Dictionary with market cap, PE ratio, EPS, beta, dividend yield, 52-week high/low, price-to-book
example_queries: What's the market cap of Amazon?
